Functions
fza_fnc_weaponSelectFireMode
Description

Selects the specific weapon AND firemode on a turret.

May fail in some circumstances (if the firemode doesn't exist), if so will return false and log an error.

Parameters
_vehicle

The vehicle to apply this to

_turret

The turret to work on

_weapon

The name of the weapon to select - note this can also be done with the muzzle

_fireMode

The name of the firemode to select

_magazine

The magazine to select

Returns
Bool

whether operation succeded

Examples

[_heli, [0], "fza_agm114_23_8", "TopDown"] call fza_fnc_weaponSelectFireMode; Author: mattysmith22
